ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh but sometrhing has changed very recently..... ... From: Murr Rockstroh  To:  Sent: Friday, December 17,
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh but sometrhing has changed very recently.....

----- Original Message -----
From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, December 17, 1999 10:11 AM
Subject: RE: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap


> From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
>
> This must be why at L35 a few weeks ago I was stuck at 100
>
> Hmm Lx5 - 13
> 35x5 - 13
> 162 max..... Nope wrong, I spent 1000 pp on it trying to make Stalking
> Probes only to discover the cap....
>
>
> Not lets see again....
> (L - 15) x 5
> (35 - 15) x 5
> 100 max..... Seems to be exactly where I was stuck.....
>
> Vapn, L36 Gnome Warrior (102 Tinkering since hitting L36, hmm it went up
off
> a few attempts relative to the last try at L35)
>
>
> I think the post below is wrong, unless something has changed very
recently.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Diablokilr@... [mailto:Diablokilr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 7:55 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap
>
>
> From: Diablokilr@...
>
> Ok I'm only going to say this one more time.... the tinker skill
formula
> is
>
> Level x 5 - 13
>
> THE END!!!!!
>
>
